thread.title: 'Game of Thrones' Season 7 gets a release date...and it's in ice?
thread.title_full: 'Game of Thrones' Season 7 gets a release date...and it's in ice?

author: Proma Khosla
title: 'Game of Thrones' Season 7 gets a release date...and it's in ice?
text:
Winter is coming to HBO in summer â€” at least, once the ice thaws.
Game of Thrones Season 7 will announce its release date via Facebook Live on the official Game of Thrones page , where the date is currently encased in a block of ice and can only be melted down as fans type "FIRE" in the comments.
SEE ALSO: Ian McShane thinks 'Game of Thrones' fans need to 'get a f*cking life'
This post will be updated with the exact date when the ice melts, which, judging from the below stream, may take a bit.
On March 7, actor Liam Cunningham who plays Ser Davos Seaworth, told The Independent that the new season would premiere in July.
Game of Thrones Season 7 will only have seven episodes instead of the usual 10, as discussed last year by HBO programming and the show's producers.
Season 6 ended with Cersei famously silencing the haters , Daenerys taking back Meereen and taking to the seas with Tyrion, and Jon and Sansa in the process of unifying the North under what remains of the Stark family. A Game of Thrones concert experience is currently touring the United States until April 2.
WATCH: Natalie Dormer reveals what it's like to be killed off on 'Game of Thrones'
